definition: sound (often with negative, not a sound)/whisper
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: Pushing it softly open and tiptoeing in, I found all quiet inside, and my wife fast asleep.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻地推门进去，什么声息也没有，妻已睡熟好久了。

sentences.english: It appears from nowhere, and without a sound.
sentences.chinese: 它凭空突然出现，全然没有声息。

sentences.english: Such lost worlds are vanishingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这样消逝的世界正在悄无声息地变得稀有起来。

sentences.english: The pattering of my feet made no noise on the moist earth.
sentences.chinese: 潮湿的泥土使我的脚步听起来悄无声息。

sentences.english: And when we play, time goes by unnoticeably.
sentences.chinese: 当我们玩的时候，时间悄无声息的走过。

sentences.english: The very stealth, the eerie quietness, of the thing makes it more magical.
sentences.chinese: 它的诡秘和悄无声息更增添了它的神奇。

sentences.english: The night waned , and I worked hastily, but in silence.
sentences.chinese: 夜色阑珊，我麻利地忙活着，当然是悄无声息。

sentences.english: Yin soft voice as disappeared silently dollar voice interest.
sentences.chinese: 阴柔的声音如石沉大海般悄元声息。

sentences.english: All this appears crucial to the stealthy effect of Ryokan's works.
sentences.chinese: 这些对容坎作品中那种悄无声息的效果都至关重要。

sentences.english: This operation failed silently, with no error message.
sentences.chinese: 这个操作悄无声息地失败了，没有给出任何错误消息。

sentences.english: The ranger's footsteps made no sound as he climbed toward the summit.
sentences.chinese: 游侠悄无声息的向顶峰攀爬着。

sentences.english: The sea crept noiselessly up the shore.
sentences.chinese: 海水悄无声息地上海岸。

sentences.english: Pushing it softly open and tiptoeing in, I found all quiet inside, and my wife fast asleep.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻地推门进去，声息也，妻已睡熟好久了。

sentences.english: Right here, the river of life floods, endlessly and silently.
sentences.chinese: 生命之河就在此地泛流，无止无尽，悄无声息。

sentences.english: For a long time, no sound, just drunk, do not want to wake up.
sentences.chinese: 很久很久，没有声息，只愿沉醉，不想醒来。

sentences.english: There is a silent health crisis among males nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 当今，在男性当中流行着一种悄无声息的健康危机。

definition: wordless and uncommunicative (idiom); without speaking/taciturn/not providing any news
